com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.velocity

Class VelocityRendering

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.velocity.VelocityRendering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer.BytesOut

    public class VelocityRendering
extends Object
implements Renderer.BytesOut
    A VelocityRendering captures the state required to render a particular request into some output format using Velocity macros. There is one VelocityRendering object per incoming request.
    Author:
    Ian Dickinson, Epimorphics (mailto:ian@epimorphics.com)

      • writeAll

        public void writeAll(Times times,
            OutputStream os)
        Write the rendered output to the output stream, and side-effect the given Times object to record duration and output counts.
        Specified by:
        writeAll in interface Renderer.BytesOut
        Parameters:
        times - Record used to capture time and size information on output
        os - The output stream to write to
